<title>VH-1 Storytellers | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="A DVD release of Springsteen’s April 2005 performance, which featured the live debut of two songs from Devils & Dust." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />

<meta property="og:title" content="VH-1 Storytellers" />
<meta property="og:description" content="A DVD release of Springsteen’s April 2005 performance, which featured the live debut of two songs from Devils & Dust. Bruce performed on acoustic guitar and piano, with Patti Scialfa joining on backing vocals for “Brilliant Disguise.” He discussed his writing process and the stories behind the songs, also taking questions from the audience." />

yoast_head_json.title: VH-1 Storytellers | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: A DVD release of Springsteen’s April 2005 performance, which featured the live debut of two songs from Devils & Dust.
yoast_head_json.og_description: A DVD release of Springsteen’s April 2005 performance, which featured the live debut of two songs from Devils & Dust. Bruce performed on acoustic guitar and piano, with Patti Scialfa joining on backing vocals for “Brilliant Disguise.” He discussed his writing process and the stories behind the songs, also taking questions from the audience.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: A DVD release of Springsteen’s April 2005 performance, which featured the live debut of two songs from Devils & Dust. Bruce performed on acoustic guitar and piano, with Patti Scialfa joining on backing vocals for “Brilliant Disguise.” He discussed his writing process and the stories behind the songs, also taking questions from the audience.
